reapack.name: MachineView_exec.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Machines: An interface plugin for REAPER 5.x and up designed to mimick the machine editor in Jeskola Buzz.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Messing with how it is indexed in reapack

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added visualization and toggle of record option

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Parse user categories. Added under shift + click.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Also parse user folders now. Moved location in the code where the builtin folder is cached, to isolate bugs in case they occur and not make the whole script unusable.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Hackey Trackey Integration ==> Shift + Double LMB

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added optional grid snapping

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix renderbug on linux.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added (optional) use of track colors. + Finished system that will allow to use multiple key/mouse bindings. + Added double escape = close. + Added hover over signal cables to visualize signal cable.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix in delete behaviour.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Attempted fix for rename issue

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed issue with MASTER mute and solo behavior

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added return to default on double-click

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Changed grid opacity + Changed grid to square + REM => DEL for disconnect + Added modifier option to send audio to sidechain + Added option to swap move button to RMB (F12) + Added console messages

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Suppress dialog when VST machine list doesn't exist

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Show signal cable as active when manipulating signal + Make doubleclick focus on first effect

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added extra F9 option for showing only routing of selected tracks. + Get closer to native colors. + Added word-wrapping for machine names.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added text outline to help make text more readable. + Fix colorbleed. + Added outer solo button. + Changed wire showing behaviour for mode 3. + Don't allow clicking invisible connectors.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added vertical layout mode (CTRL+F7). + Updated FoxAsteria keymap.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed mute clicking region. + Fixed mute rapid toggle problem. + Show volume of sum of left and right channels rather than just left. + Show estimate of the audio panning at bottom of track. + Option to follow last clicked track in TCP. + Option to follow last clicked track in Mixer.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added fit to screen (CTRL + F5). + Switched render order messages. + Fixed some minor renderbugs. + Don't display signal when silent. + Changed display behaviour for wire hover in show only wires for selected mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added undo to undo block movement (CTRL + U), was not possible to make a regular undo point for this sadly. Note that this resets when you reset machine view. + Allow clicking along whole line. + Constantly update tracks.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Multisolo / mute. + Fix click yrange block. + Added extra hinting when block is solo'd to make it more clear.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Hotfix: Make sure sinks to self are omitted (bugfix for master always coming up). + Remove console output mute. + Change mute color

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fancier selection animation / highlighting. + Allow multiport visualization.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added palette (lower left corner, outer RMB on top one to select new color).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor fix clipping. + Show wires when hovering over track even in selected track wire mode.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Modify cursor command seems a bit buggy. Attempt 2

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added toggle to disable colorbar completely.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Rename reaper-kb.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Option for shadow alpha and offset (shadowAlpha & shadowOffset). + Option for setting text rendering (outline or not). 0 = inverse of bg color, 1 = outlined, 2 = white or black depending on bg color. + Added option to control dials by mousewheel. + Added option to fix mute button size (muteButtonSize, 0 is autosize, >0 is fixed size). + Highlight with light in night mode. + Improved look of arrow (solid). + Added options to modify alpha transparency of sends/parents (sendAlpha and parentAlpha). + Fixed annoying issues with highlighting wires that were under blocks. + Added extra penalty spring force between tracks that is driven by color similarity (to improve clustering by color). + Added small noise term to avoid local optima when running the force simulation. + Improved row sorting for linear layout (attempt to avoid sending signal backwards and attempt to skip more than 1 machine vertically). + Option to open configuration file from script (CTRL+F10). Warning: Close the machine view before you save it, or it gets overwritten. + Improved visibility signal flow on night theme (green-based highlighting to maintain visibility when using programs such as f.lux).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + First attempt at VCA handling.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfixes VCA handling (nil on master without slaves). + Added option to manipulate master volume and panning of tracks with no sends.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Show small metering in channel control window. + Exposed noise floor that is used in metering in config file

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix group solo not working in some cases (was caused by broadcast blocking being non-property specific). + Added tweaking config setting for gradient alpha. + Added wire thickness config setting. + CTRL + A + Linked multi-hide also from dialog now. + Exposed pansize (Positive values scale with UI, negative values keep fixed size. A minimum size can also be specified). + Exposed font in config file. + Fix bug mutebox rendering (weird colors).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Config file sort and descriptions.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added signal analysis buttons (requires analyzer jsfx plugin). + TO DO: Refactor sink deletion code which would allow for continuous updating of send vol/pan properties when analyzing signal.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added following for the signal analyzer. When performing signal analysis on a send, it will now respond to channel/volume/panning etc.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Make sure that signal analysis track doesn't have FX prior to adding the meter.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Gray unselected text + Make default gradient much more subtle.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow customization fader range

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix bug that could be caused by accidentally using a global color similarity index rather than a local copy. + Add optional config flag to always defocus the window (named dropfocus, 0 = default).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Moved night mode to persistent settings. + Fix bug that makes mouse disappear after painting.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add option to show only selected tracks. + Update help file to reflect current UX.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Expose grid multiplicator as config value.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add ENTER as shortcut for adding via regular FX browser. + Make DBL click just open the FX browser. Set config option onlyShowTopEffect to 1 for old behavior.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add mode for showing all related tracks. + Prevent possible recursion bug in hide traversal.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Don't update selection when dragging area has zero size. + Always show master. + Always show unconnected nodes. + Don't update the selection when connecting machines. + When using drag select: only update selection immediately if we are not in one of the modes that hide non selected blocks. + Make sure analyzer is hidden for special "show only X"-modes. + Add little note icon for channel being monitored. + Handle cyclic graphs a bit better (traverse both ways once).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Remove mpl wiredchain.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add menu to dock on the top left (right mouse click on the little triangle that appears there).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Only start dragging when left mouse was previously up

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Ctrl + doubleclick machine opens MPL Wiredchain (relies on it already being installed!) + Alt + doubleclick opens FX window instead of just first effect + Change rename color dark theme + Added little cursor thingy for renaming machines
